file_content.text: Come on, baby! Move those lekku! Show Veeboo what you got! I'm paying good money for this!
Have another round of bantha blasters, boys! Drink up while it's flowing!
You let Tyresius Lokai live, Veeboo. That's not how we do things.
Oh, it's you--my "rival." Welcome to the party!
You're probably wondering why an amazing bounty hunter like myself quit the Great Hunt and let Tyresius go.
The answer's simple: more credits than I'd ever earn chasing bounties for the rest of my life. Even if I won the Great Hunt!
What good is it if you're living on Tatooine?
Too bad you're stuck here.
I have a yacht being delivered from Corellia. When it arrives, I'll go live the high life wherever I want.
Being a bounty hunter is about more than making money.
You have no honor.
Save it. All I ever wanted was to retire in style.
If you give me those credits, I might forget I found you.
In that case, hand them over.
You think I'd walk around with that much on me? I'm lazy, not stupid!
If you're looking for Tyresius, you just missed him. He dropped by a little before you. Said he needed a new ship.
I sent him to the Lady of Pain. Can't wait to see what she does with him! Ha!
You may have quit the Great Hunt, but I haven't. Let's finish this.
I'm supposed to kill you.
You want a fight, huh? That's fine.
Who's this Lady of Pain? Your wife?
The Lady of Pain?
Don't worry about her. Worry about me.
See, Tyresius tossed me a bonus to eliminate you. Thanks for making yourself easy to find.
Come on, boys! Time to earn your pay!
The party's over, Veeboo.
Time to die. [Attack.]
Can't you see I'm busy celebrating? Go bother someone else!
